slides.title: Introduction
slides.transcript: Hi, I'm Denis Leif Kreuzer, originally from Frankfurt. I come from a creative background — I've spent over a decade working as a Creative Director and Strategist, leading brand, design, and content projects for everything from startups to major international events.

slides.title: Studio Sen
slides.transcript: I've also founded my own studio, Studio Sen, where we combine design, storytelling, and mindfulness with emerging tech.

slides.title: Tech Transition
slides.transcript: Over time, I found myself more and more drawn to the tech side of things — not just using digital tools, but actually building them. I started experimenting with automation, generative design, and AI-driven workflows, and realized how much more impact I could have by understanding the tech behind the visuals.

slides.title: Unique Value
slides.transcript: What makes me a great fit is that I don't just bring technical skills — I bring the full package: creativity, strategy, leadership, and now, the technical know-how to actually bring ideas to life from concept to code.

slides.title: Vision
slides.transcript: I understand both the user side and the system side, and I love bridging those two worlds. That's what really drives me: creating things that are not just functional, but thoughtful and meaningful.
